p: Samples treated with TTO showed higher TPC in this study; this agrees with previous work that observed higher TPC content during refrigerated storage of lettuce heads treated with TTO [ 51]. They also mentioned that this result could be ascribed to the induction of PAL by TTO, resulting in higher biosynthesis of phenolic compounds. Additionally, the potential of EOs antioxidant activity could reduce the oxidation of phenolic compound [ 56].
